channel.title: V0.20 is coming
channel.description:
**Gancio *0.20-beta is coming***
Try it out at https://demo.gancio.org
### Main changes
* New layout (navbar/footer/visible filters) * two month calendar on large display * admin could edit title, description, favicon & logo directly form admin panel (you can even edit this about) * new `add event` layout => https://demo.gancio.org/add * new editor to describe events ( **bold** , *italic,* [link](sdfsdf)) supported also using copy/paste * the editor also support `live markdown` (try using ### at line start) * **oauth2 server** implementation (documentation: https://gancio.org/dev/oauth) * fediverse moderation * fix embedding an event via iframe * images converted in `.webp` * new catalan translation
